== Gandaulim (626896) ==
      
Gandaulim is a village in the [[Salcete]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 38 hectares and harbouring 114 households with total population of 438 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 223 and female population is 215. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 626896<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
